item.title: Korean Conflict
item.description: Looking at a data set from Kaggle that shows data on the Korean conflict. First we need to import libraries: library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(stringr) ## Warning: package 'stringr' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(lubridate) ## Warning: package 'lubridate' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Time Series
item.description: Time Series showing Babe Ruthâ€™s Homeruns over the Years. First we must install our libraries. library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) Next we must create a dataframe: df<-Batting%>% filter(playerID=="ruthba01")%>% select(yearID,HR) Next we take that dataframe and visualize it:
